Race.Name: Deep Gnome
Race.Description:
Also called deep gnomes, svirfneblin are said to dwell in great cities deep underground. A svirfneblin has wiry, rock-colored skin usually medium brown to brownish gray. Only males are bald; females have stringy gray hair. The average svirfneblin lifespan is 250 years.
Starts with 1 level of: Wizard

Feat.Name: Racial Spell Resistance
Feat.Description: You are naturally resistance to spells and magical effects. You have a base Spell Resistance of 6, protecting you from many non-damaging spells and effects.

Feat.Name: Past Life: Deep Gnome
Feat.Description: Iconic Past Life Stance: +1 Illusion DC to spells you cast and +5 Acid Spell Power per stack of this Past Life. Passive Bonus: +3 Magical Resistance per stack of this Past Life.

Stance.Name: Deep Gnome
Stance.Description: Iconic Past Life Stance: +[1/2/3] Illusion DC and +[5/10/15] Acid Spell Power
